Song.title: Nothing But the Blood of Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Robert Lowry Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]What can wash a[G]way my sin? [G]Nothing but the blood of [D]Je-[G]sus; [G]What can make me [G]whole again? [G]Nothing but the blood of [D]Je-[G]sus.
Refrain: [G]Oh! Precious [G]is the flow [D]That makes me [D7]white as [G]snow; [Em]No other [G/B]fount I know, [Am]Nothing but the [G/B]blood of [D]Je-[G]sus!
Verse 2: [G]For my pardon [G]this I see. [G]Nothing but the blood of [D]Je-[G]sus; [G]For my cleansing, [G]this my plea. [G]Nothing but the blood of [D]Je-[G]sus.
Verse 3: [G]This is all my [G]hope and peace. [G]Nothing but the blood of [D]Je-[G]sus; [G]This is all my [G]righteousness. [G]Nothing but the blood of [D]Je-[G]sus.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 what can wash away my sin nothing but the blood of jesus what can make me whole again nothing but the blood of jesus refrain oh precious is the flow that makes me white as snow no other fount i know nothing but the blood of jesus verse 2 for my pardon this i see nothing but the blood of jesus for my cleansing this my plea nothing but the blood of jesus verse 3 this is all my hope and peace nothing but the blood of jesus this is all my righteousness nothing but the blood of jesus

Arrangement.description: Arrangement by Tim Schmidt with added Bridge
Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [E]What can wash away my sin? [E]Nothing but the blood of [B]Je-[E]sus; [E]What can make me whole again? [E]Nothing but the blood of [B]Je-[E]sus.
Refrain: [E]Oh! Precious is the flow [B]That makes me white as sn[E]ow; [E]No other fount I know, [E]Nothing but the [E/G#]blood of [B]Je-[E]sus!
Verse 2: [E]For my pardon this I see. [E]Nothing but the blood of [B]Je-[E]sus; [E]For my cleansing, this my plea. [E]Nothing but the [E/G#]blood of [B]Je-[E]sus. SING REFRAIN THEN TO BRIDGE
Bridge: [A]Thank you for Your love, tha[E/G#]nk you for Your Blood Th[A]ank you for the Cross, oh G[B]od (4X)
Verse 3: [E]This is all my hope and peace. [E]Nothing but the blood of Jesus; [E]This is all my righteousness. [E]Nothing but the [E/G#]blood of [B]Je-[E]sus.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 what can wash away my sin nothing but the blood of jesus what can make me whole again nothing but the blood of jesus refrain oh precious is the flow that makes me white as snow no other fount i know nothing but the blood of jesus verse 2 for my pardon this i see nothing but the blood of jesus for my cleansing this my plea nothing but the blood of jesus sing refrain then to bridge bridge thank you for your love thank you for your blood thank you for the cross oh god 4x verse 3 this is all my hope and peace nothing but the blood of jesus this is all my righteousness nothing but the blood of jesus

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]What can wash [D]a[G]way my sin? [Am]Nothing but the b[G/B]lood of [D]Je-[G]sus; [G]What can make [D]me [G]whole again? [Am]Nothing but the b[G/B]lood of [D]Je-[G]sus.
Refrain: [G]Oh! Pre[D]cious [G]is the flow [D]That makes me [D7]white as [G]snow; [G]No oth[D]er [G]fount I know, [Am]Nothing but the [Cmaj7]blood of [D]Je-[G]sus!
Verse 2: [G]For my par[D]don [G]this I see. [Am]Nothing but the b[G/B]lood of [D]Je-[G]sus; [G]For my cleans[D]ing, [G]this my plea. [Am]Nothing but the b[G/B]lood of [D]Je-[G]sus.
Verse 3: [G]This is all [D]my [G]hope and peace. [Am]Nothing but the b[G/B]lood of [D]Je-[G]sus; [G]This is all [D]my [G]righteousness. [Am]Nothing but the b[G/B]lood of [D]Je-[G]sus.

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]What can [Dsus/F#]wash a[G/E]way my [G/D]sin? [Am]Nothing [G/B]but the b[Cmaj7]lood of [Dsus - D]Je-[G]sus; [G]What can [Dsus/F#]make me [G/E]whole a[G/D]gain? [Am]Nothing [G/B]but the b[Cmaj7]lood of [Dsus - D]Je-[G]sus.
Refrain: [G]Oh! Pre[D/F#]cious [G/E]is the [G/D]flow [Am7]That [Cmaj7]makes me [Am/D]white as [G]snow; [G]No [D/F#]other [G/E]fount I [G/D]know, [Am7]Nothing [G/B]but the [Cmaj7]blood of [D]Je-[G]sus!
Verse 2: [G]For my [Dsus/F#]pardon [G/E]this I [G/D]see. [Am]Nothing [G/B]but the b[Cmaj7]lood of [Dsus - D]Je-[G]sus; [G]For my [Dsus/F#]cleansing, [G/E]this my [G/D]plea. [Am]Nothing [G/B]but the b[Cmaj7]lood of [Dsus - D]Je-[G]sus.
Verse 3: [G]This is [Dsus/F#]all my [G/E]hope and [G/D]peace. [Am]Nothing [G/B]but the b[Cmaj7]lood of [Dsus - D]Je-[G]sus; [G]This is [Dsus/F#]all my [G/E]righteous[G/D]ness. [Am]Nothing [G/B]but the b[Cmaj7]lood of [Dsus - D]Je-[G]sus.
